rationale: The source document is a placeholder with no technical substance. It cannot support implementation decisions, but it is useful as a deterministic negative-control run for validating finalize callback schema, persistence, and audit behavior.
rejection_reasons: No technical problem statement, method, or evaluative evidence exists in the source.
No novelty claims are presented and therefore cannot be validated.
Any product implementation inferred from this document would be speculative and non-auditable.
recommendations: Use this run for E2E finalize callback regression tests and contract hardening.
Add semantic content-quality gates before assigning research-quality completion.
Enforce source/extraction checksum requirements in finalization payloads.
Acquire a substantive whitepaper for actual implementation planning.
follow_up_actions: Define minimum-content policy and quality status taxonomy for whitepaper runs.
Implement JSON-schema validation for finalize synthesis/verdict payloads.
Add dummy-PDF negative-control test in the workflow CI path.
